Welcome to Causeway Digital

We build game based adventures!

Tell Me More

What we do

We build game-based learning experiences for classrooms across the world. Partnering with Mojang and Microsoft, to create exciting content for educators.

Educational Minecraft content creation

We are Minecraft Education Edition Partners, having worked with the teams at Microsoft and Mojang to build content for classrooms across the world.

Introduction to coding content building

With many years of coding education experience between the team, we specilise in building content to help new coders to get started quickly, through game based experiences.

Java/Bedrock Minecraft content creation

As well as experience with the Education Edition of Minecraft, the team has significant experience building content for both Java and Bedrock based versions of Minecraft.

Portfolio

Interested in some of the projects we have worked on? Take a look below.

Seymour Island

A multiplayer introduction to coding in Minecraft Education Edition.

This 2-3 hour activity will bring a class of students on a coding adventure. Initially beginning on the high seas, with Captain Pappert, the students will eventually find themselves shipwrecked on Seymour Island. After sneaking into the town (through the town sewers), students find themselves tasked with fixing a number of issues that have arisen around the town. These 8 tasks range from basic agent movement, to conditionals and loops, with students receiving a point on the leaderboard for each completed. The tasks are available to students in MakeCode Blocks or MakeCode Python, with some tasks also requiring them to collaborate with other students.

The lesson can be downloaded from the Minecraft Education Edition world library.

  • Date: June 2020
  • Client: Microsoft / Mojang
  • Category: Minecraft Education Edition
  • Source: Github

Notebooks Tutorials

A collection of tutorials for the new Python Notebooks editor within Minecraft Education Edition

A collection of 18 tutorials for the Minecraft Education Edition Notebooks Python code editor. These tutorials, initially based off a set created for the Makecode platform, took significant work to translate over to this new platform.
They are now used every day by thousands of students across the world.

  • Date: June 2020
  • Client: Microsoft / Mojang
  • Category: Minecraft Education Edition
  • Source: Github

Python Islands

A collection of 6 lessons teaching a full introduction to Python coding

Welcome to the Kingdom of the Floating Islands. This mystical kingdom floats high above the world below. Throughout this collection of 6 lessons, students will learn the basics of Python, through a series of themed tasks in each world. Completing these tasks will allow the kingdom to develop further technologically. Aimed at KS3 students, these lessons cover everything from input/outputs, to conditional statements, loops and right up to lists.

The worlds can be downloaded from the links below

  • Island 1
  • Island 2
  • Island 3
  • Island 4
  • Island 5
  • Island 6
  • Date: June 2020 - October 2020
  • Client: Minecraft / Mojang
  • Category: Minecraft Education Edition
  • Source: Github
